Row.Text: Greetings, wayward one. I am known as Pacal. Do you bear a message from the Gods? I can feel them, their icy breath down my neck.
Well met, stranger - you may call me Pacal the Great. Not that it really matters...I don't think we'll speak again.
What gloom and despair do you bring to the mighty Pacal? I would offer refreshments, but I have an apocalypse to prepare for.
You bring destruction upon yourself!
How disappointing you are...
You have angered Death. He wakes!
Wait. The owls of Death will come for you next.
I knew this was a waste of time...
Yes, yes! The Gods favor me! I shall rule supreme, if only until the end!
You see, I told you this was pointless, what with the great flood upon us. All those possible sacrifices, wasted.
Take what you want - it is meaningless now. Can you not see what lies on the horizon?
Haha. You silly fool! Enjoy what spoils while you can - they will weigh you down when the ground crumbles beneath your feet.
The end! I can feel the stars' lament as they loose from the sky! You are doomed to see the world decay, while saving me from such a fate.
Enjoy your petty kingdom while you can...nothing matters anymore. I don't matter...you don't matter... The owls! I can hear the owls!
Once the heavens are awash in the flood, you too shall be swept away in the currents. You have done me a great favor; I no longer must witness this.
You may have defeated me, but you cannot stop what is already in motion. Our destinies are prescribed in stone - only the tears of the gods may wash away their carvings.
A good day to you, I hope.
Greetings.
I doubt we'll meet again.
Goodbye.
Very well.
Why do you wish to cheat me when there is so little time left?
Can you do a little better?
That's not quite good enough.
Almost...
This will not do.
Fine, take it. Know that it will not help you once the Long Count ends.
What ridiculousness is this? Have you no sacrifices to make - it is a better use of your time.
The rage of the Gods be upon you, lest you heed my offer.
My ancestors say I need more wealth to offer Gods. Give me this, so that we may both live to see the end.
All right.
Why not?
I must refuse.
No, I think not.
Let's hear it.
It matters not - go ahead.
Will you be spending the apocalypse with me?
Hello again.
Farewell, perhaps forever.
Goodbye.
Agreed.
It may be the end of the world, but I do have appearances to keep up. Improve this.
Is that the best you can do?
You're almost there...
Thank you, but no.
Yes? Yes! I know this offering of generosity will endear the gods towards me! Take what you will!
Why do you wish to steal from Pacal? Can you do nothing better with your time before the world crumbles to dust?
Friend, I believe I may have found a way to save us all! Look, look and accept my offering!
The sky, the sky demands blood! Please help me, or else Kisin and his demons may come for us next.
Sure.
No, it won't do.
We decline.
Proceed.
I'm listening.
Oh, it's you.
What do you want?
That is all.
Go away now.
Agreed, not that it matters anyway.
Unless you want your blood to be sprinkled next at my altar, rethink that offer.
That's not good enough.
You must do better than that.
Almost, peasant...
The scourge of the ancestors be upon you! You have angered the gods with your impudence. Leave!
Yes, take your destruction upon yourself with open hands. The gods laugh at your greed!
Not that it will matter shortly, but I deny you your request purely out of spite.
While I do wish nothing more than to spill your blood upon the sacred altar, I will ask politely. Once.
Woe and destruction upon those who do not meet my demands! The end is nigh, and I have quite an elaborate sacrifice to prepare for.
I suppose I must.
I beg your pardon?
That's unacceptable.
You cannot be serious!
What now?
Only one may live to see the end of the Long Count cycle, and it surely will not be witless nonbeliever like you! Prepare for destruction.
One hope, one hope remains. If I defeat you, perhaps I can renew the God's faith in man and stop the teaming floods of ruin.
Yes! A sacrifice unlike all others must be made! I shall stem the gods' tears with the blood of your entire people!
Yes! A sacrifice unlike all others must be made! I shall stem the gods' tears with the blood of your entire people!
Why bother with this charade and portentous dance? None of this matters any more, none of it...
The cycle is ending, I can feel it. This is only the beginning - you have unleashed the cry for the end of time.
What is this? You wish to hurry the end of days? By all means, let us lay waste to this already doomed world.
